about.title: About Me
about.description: As a seasoned Full-Stack Developer, I blend technical expertise with creative problem-solving to build robust, scalable applications. My journey in software development is driven by a passion for creating elegant solutions that make a real impact.

education.title: Education
education.description: Advanced Diploma in Computer Engineering Technology from Algonquin College with Honours (2023).

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Full-Stack Programmer Analyst at the Canadian Coast Guard, specializing in critical applications.

expertise.title: Technical Expertise
expertise.description: Proficient in modern full-stack development with expertise in cloud solutions and microservices architecture.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Consistently recognized for technical excellence and innovative problem-solving in enterprise environments.

leadership.title: Leadership & Collaboration
leadership.description: Proven track record of leading technical initiatives and collaborating across government agencies

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.description: Strong analytical mindset demonstrated through complex application development and automation

communication.title: Technical Communication
communication.description: Expert at translating complex technical concepts and writing comprehensive documentation

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Experienced in Agile methodologies and managing multiple critical applications

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Strong analytical skills in data visualization and statistical analysis

adaptability.title: Technical Adaptability
adaptability.description: Proven ability to quickly master new technologies and frameworks

resume.title: Unlock My Resume
resume.subtitle: Enter the special access code to download my resume instantly!

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to work together? I'd love to hear from you!
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.
contact.responseMessage: I typically respond within 24 hours during business days. Looking forward to connecting with you!

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my technical expertise, featuring enterprise applications, data analysis tools, and innovative solutions.

erms.title: Enterprise Resource Management System
erms.description: Architected and developed a comprehensive web application for managing organizational resources and workflows. Implemented CQRS pattern and modern architectural principles to ensure scalability and maintainability.

skiPatrol.title: Canadian Ski Patrol Rewrite Template
skiPatrol.description: Developed a CRUD modern web application template for the Canadian Ski Patrol using TypeScript and modern web technologies. Implemented material design components and responsive layouts with SCSS for an optimal user experience.

telegramAnalyzer.title: Telegram Chat Analyzer
telegramAnalyzer.description: Built a comprehensive chat analysis tool using Python, featuring advanced data visualization and statistical analysis of conversation patterns, user engagement, and sentiment analysis.

picross.title: Interactive Picross Game
picross.description: Developed a modern implementation of the classic Picross/Nonogram puzzle game with multiplayer support, featuring a sleek GUI and efficient algorithms.

sqoWebsite.title: SQO Group Website
sqoWebsite.description: Designed and developed a professional website for a quantum physics research group, implementing responsive design principles and modern web technologies.
